data.text: @EMSwami Guy if you want to wear a mask wear one. If you don’t, don’t. Stop posting this all the time. NO CARES!
@EMSwami And if you can't answer, then how can the effect size really be 20%+?

@EMSwami Undeniable - except in Spain where they only mask schoolchildren above a certain age. With a huge effect size, you should be able to see it on this chart of covid cases by age. What age did they start mandating masks? https://t.co/MBvQSJsoKT
